report.query: select PANNUMBER,LINEID,DOCUMENTATIONAMOUNT,'Yes' RELEASED, decode(REVOLVINGLINE, 'Y' , 'Yes' , 'N' , 'No', '') REVOLVINGLINE, decode(CAPITALMARKETEXPOSURE, 'Y' , 'Yes' , 'N' , 'No', '') CAPITALMARKETEXPOSURE, decode(REALESTATEEXPOSURE, 'Y' , 'Yes' , 'N' , 'No', '') REALESTATEEXPOSURE, ESTATETYPEVAL, nvl(COMMESTATETYPEVAL,(SELECT entry_name FROM COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY WHERE category_code = 'COMMERCIAL_REAL_ESTATE' and active_status = '1' and entry_code= COMMESTATETYPE)) COMMESTATETYPEVAL, nvl(RULEIDVAL,(SELECT entry_name FROM COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY WHERE category_code = 'NPA_RULE_ID' and active_status = '1' and entry_code= RULEID)) RULEIDVAL, decode(PRIORITYFLAG, 'Y' , 'Yes' , 'N' , 'No', '') PRIORITYFLAG, nvl(PRIORITYVAL,(SELECT entry_name FROM COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY WHERE category_code = decode(PRIORITYFLAG, 'Y' , 'PRIORITY_SECTOR_Y' , 'N' , 'PRIORITY_SECTOR', '') and active_status = '1' and entry_code= PRIORITY)) PRIORITYVAL, nvl(UNCONDICANCLCOMMITMENTVAL,(SELECT entry_name FROM COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY WHERE category_code = 'UNCONDI_CANCL_COMMITMENT' and active_status = '1' and entry_code= UNCONDICANCLCOMMITMENT)) UNCONDICANCLCOMMITMENTVAL, BORROWERCUSTOMERID LIABILITY_ID, nvl(LIABILITYBRANCHVAL, (select BRANCHCODE from CMS_FCCBRANCH_MASTER where status ='ACTIVE' and DEPRECATED = 'N' and BRANCHCODE =LIABILITYBRANCH)) LIABILITYBRANCHVAL, decode(AVAILABLE, 'Y' , 'Yes' , 'N' , 'No', '') AVAILABLE, LINECODE, BORROWERCUSTOMERID SYSTEM_ID, BORROWERADDITIONDATE LIMIT_START_DATE, decode(FREEZE, 'Y' , 'Yes' , 'N' , 'No', '') FREEZE, REMARKS, FINALLIMITRELEASABLE RELEASED_AMT, ACTION, decode (STATUS, 'S', 'Success', 'F', 'Reject' , 'Reject') STATUS, ERRORCODE, ERRORMESSAGE from CMS_ECBF_LMT_INTERFACE_LOG

reportParamters.reportName: Success/Reject/Summary Report of Party Line & Limit Details
